data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_5a8345c69a4c9c611fdfce91089fe74a.png

skilllist.skilldesc: After each skill cast, Clint's next Basic Attack within 4s penetrates a line of enemies, dealing 50<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. This damage can trigger attack effects, and the part affected by Physical Attack can Crit.

Clint fires 5 bullets in quick succession in the target direction, each dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+85% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the enemy hit.

The bullets will spread evenly across enemies in a fan-shaped area. Enemies hit by multiple bullets will take less damage after the first bullet.

Clint shoots a trap net in the target direction, slightly jumping back while dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font><font color="62f8fe"> (+150% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and immobilizing them for 1.2s.

Successfully hitting an enemy reduces the cooldown of this skill by 40%.

Clint launches a grenade in the target direction that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 280<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing them by 25% for 1.2s.

Clint gains a grenade charge every 12s (up to 5).

data.name: Clint

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Super long range squishy killer with Defense Penetration.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equiptips:
+160 Extra Physical Attack
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
equiplist.equipskill2: Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Armor Buster: Increase Physical Penetration by 30%.
Breaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Physical Penetration for each point of the enemy's Physical Defense, capped at 30%.
equiplist.equiptips: +60 Extra Physical Attack

equiplist.equipskill1: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ambush: If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s (excluding from Minions or Creeps), the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 160<font color="fba51f"> (+0.4 Total Physical Attack)</font> Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 1.5s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+70 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP

recommendmasterplan.name: Titamin
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A sharpshooter full of righteousness and justice.

assist.desc: Clint works best with Supportsthat can enhance his kiting ability, such as Rafaela and Angela.

strong.desc: Clint counters heroes with comparatively shorter range like Moskov and Miya thanks to the superior range of his skills and Basic Attacks.

weak.desc: Clint is countered by Marksmen with burst damage like Melissa and Karrie since he lacks burst in the early and mid game to trade blows with them.
